overview

Welcome To The NVM Foundation

We specialize in providing comprehensive offline coaching classes for students aged 6 to 14 years, covering subjects from I to VIII, as well as IX standard Math and Science. Our services cater to various curriculum types including CBSE, IGCSE, IB, and GB English.

Mission & Vissions

Our Mission & Vissions

Mission

NVM Foundation is a nurturing ground for an individuals holistic development to make an effective contribution to the society in a dynamic Enviorment. We Empowers the learners to excel with excellence, equity, character, and lifelong learning through collaboration with parents and community partnerships.

Vission

To nuture and train the learners to grow into globally sensitive individiuals laced with indian values, firmly rooted in indian culture, equipped with knowledge and skills to help them became a responsible citizen of the worls. This global dimensions is to be reflected in the attitude and values of young minds. /p>

Motto

विद्यां ददाति विनयं विनयाद याति प्रात्रतांम पात्रत्वात् धनमा, ‌योति, धनात् धर्म ततः सुखम्

Empowering Transformation through Our Guiding Principles

Integrity

Integrity is you fulfilling the word and thought you give to yourself and to others, and experiencing a state of Poornatva - completion with yourself and with life.

Authenticity

Authenticity is you being established in the peak of your capability and responding to life from who you perceive yourself to be for yourself, who you project yourself to be for others, and, what others expect you to be for them.

Responsibility

Responsibility — Living and responding to life from the truth that you are the source of, and therefore, you are responsible for all happenings in and around you.

Enriching

Enriching - Is you taking responsibility with integrity and authenticity that you are committed to continuously enriching, which is expanding yourself and life in and around you.
